relation: Plastic tray and grate. Simple and clean.
All liquid is absorbed by newspaper under grate on plastic tray.
Newspaper stays under grate and cannot be shredded.
Bulky box with loose and messy litter pellets.
Liquid makes little pellets soggy which get tracked all over your house
Dog can kick litter pellets out of box.
Dog can chew and swallow little pellets.
Diaper-like pad. One time use. Un-ecological.
Liquid gets stepped on and then tracked all over your house.
Liquid waste may leak onto floor.
